image.title: Travel News, Travel Destination Tips, World and India Travel News | Hindustan Times

item.title: Japan organises Neputa festival to revitalize its tourism industry
item.description: Tokyo Dome is the site of the Neputa festival which is usually used for baseball games.

item.title: Creating lasting memories: Tips to plan the perfect family vacation
item.description: From determining your budget to researching your destination and activities, this guide will provide you with the steps necessary to plan the perfect family vacation.

item.title: India opens first stage of New Delhi-Vadodara-Mumbai Expressway
item.description: India's ambitious $13 billion project of Delhi-Mumbai Expressway will eventually cut the road travel time between the country's two biggest cities in half, to 12 hours.

item.title: Ladakh to host India's first frozen-lake marathon ‘Last Run’ at Pangong Tso
item.description: Ladakh's 21km marathon, with Lukung as its starting point, will end at Maan village. 75 selected athletes from India and abroad are participating in the run, giving them an opportunity to make a bid for a Guinness world record for the world's highest frozen-lake marathon
